price: Na tukayafanya mashet'ani yamtumikie, wote wajenzi na wapiga mbizi.
footnotes: Na tukamdhalilishia kila mjenzi na mpiga mbizi katika bahari kuu miongoni mwa mashetani maasi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
